title: [Neuroscience] What Political Polarization Looks Like in the Brain: Liberal and conservative brains respond differently to political messages, a new study finds

[Medicine] Scientists have discovered how deficiencies of the IL-36Ra protein—caused by mutations in the IL36RN gene—delay wound healing via the flooding of wound with several types of immune cells. IL-36Ra can be used as a treatment for inflammatory skin diseases such as psoriasis and atopic dermatitis.
